page_analysis.text_content:
Parking

Parking regulations af-
fect the appearance of
the streetscapes in our
residential neighbor-
hoods by minimizing
the number of cars
parked on the street
and in the front yards
by requiring that there
are parking spaces
available deeper into
the lot.

Code sections
Page 34
18.12.060, 18.83.090
Page 35
18.83.090, 18.83.110(a)
Page 36
18.12.060
Page 37
18.12.040 (f)
Page 38
18.12.060
Page 39
18.12.080 (b)

34

Parking space standards

Fig 28 Parking space dimensions for garage
and uncovered space in plan view

• Two spaces are required on the lot (per
  dwelling).

• They may NOT be located in the
  required front yard or, first 10 ft of,
  required street side yard.

• 2nd dwelling units have same require-
  ments.

• No underground parking garages except
  by variance.

• One of the two spaces must be covered.

• To be considered detached, a covered-
  parking structure must be a minimum of
  3' from the main dwelling.

• Minimim size for an uncovered space is
  8.5' x 18'.

* • Minimum clearance inside a covered
  parking structure to be 10' x 20' for
  each space. Therefore, a two-car garage
  or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside.

• Minimum vertical clearance: 7'.

* Clear area for parking space must be free
  of other uses e.g., water heaters, clothes
  washers or dryer, bicycle parking facili-
  ties, etc.

visual_elements.description: A plan view diagram titled 'Fig 28 Parking space dimensions for garage and uncovered space in plan view'. It illustrates two tandem parking spaces. The top space is labeled 'Required covered space' and shows a car inside a garage-like structure. Its dimensions are marked as '10' min inside clearance' for width and '20' min. inside clearance' for length. The bottom space is labeled '2nd space (uncovered) Tandem OK' and shows a car in an open space. Its dimensions are marked as '8.5' min uncovered space' for width and '18' min. uncovered space' for length. Three asterisks are present on the diagram, one pointing to the 10' width dimension, one to the 20' length dimension, and one to the general area of the uncovered space, likely referencing the bulleted notes.
visual_elements.location: Right side of the page, from middle to bottom.

technical_specifications.value: NOT be located in the required front yard

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum distance for detached covered structure
Minimum clearance inside covered structure (per space)
Clear inside dimension for two-car garage/carport

additional_notes: The page has a two-column layout. The left column is a dark gray sidebar containing the main title, an introductory paragraph, and code references. The right column contains the main content.
The page number '34' is located at the bottom left corner.

Asterisks (*) are used as visual markers. Large asterisks appear next to two bullet points on the right side. Three smaller asterisks are used within the diagram to highlight specific dimensions and areas.
The text 'Minimim' in the bullet point 'Minimim size for an uncovered space is 8.5' x 18'' appears to be a typo for 'Minimum'.
